title: Mugam Theriya Lyrics Kuttram 23
stanzas:
Mugam theriya uyir thudikka
mugam thiruppi selvadhu
kuttram thaan.
nanban vizhi kasigaiyile
un naluval kuttram thaan.

needhi mandram sollvadhu
mattum kuttram illai.
nenjam sollum niyayathai
kaeladaa

valeduthu kolvadhu
mattum kuttram illai.
vaarthaigalaal kolvadhum
kuttram thaan.

unai nambi varum pennaiye
nirgathiyaai viduthal kutram
unnai uyiraakkiya petrorai
maraththal kuttram.

kuttrathin thozhan aasai
kuttrathil vaasal kobam
kuttrathin palane paavam
kuttrangal vazhvin saabam(2)

Mugam theriya uyir thudikka
mugam thiruppi selvadhu
kuttram thaan.
nanban vizhi kasigaiyile
un naluval kuttram thaan.

arivugalin koochchal kuttram,
meimarakkum aanmeegathil.
alavedutha vaarthai kuttram,
nanbargal koodaarathil.(2)

kuttrathin thozhan aasai
kuttrathil vaasal kobam
kuttrathin palane paavam
kuttrangal vazhvin saabam(2)

Mugam theriya uyir thudikka
mugam thiruppi selvadhu
kuttram thaan.
nanban vizhi kasigaiyile
un naluval kuttram thaan.

ovvoruvan kuttrathirkkum
avanukkena niyayam undu.
irudhiyaai kaalam sollum
niyayangalin sabaiyil nindru

kuttrathin thozhan aasai
kuttrathil vaasal kobam
kuttrathin palane paavam
kuttrangal vazhvin saabam(2)

Mugam theriya uyir thudikka
mugam thiruppi selvadhu
kuttram thaan.
nanban vizhi kasigaiyile
un naluval kuttram thaan.
